title: List of Beijing Guoan F.C. managers
text:
<a href="Beijing%20Guoan%20F.C.">Beijing Guoan Football Club</a> is a professional Chinese <a href="Association%20football">football</a> club that currently participates in the <a href="Chinese%20Super%20League">Chinese Super League</a> under licence from the <a href="Chinese%20Football%20Association">Chinese Football Association</a> (CFA). The team is based in the <a href="Chaoyang%20District%2C%20Beijing">Chaoyang District</a> in <a href="Beijing">Beijing</a>.Since its inception, <a href="Beijing%20Guoan">Beijing Guoan</a> have had 23 managers. <a href="Bruno%20G%C3%A9n%C3%A9sio">Bruno Génésio</a> is the current manager.
Background.
<a href="Tang%20Pengju">Tang Pengju</a> was the club's first manager during their professional season. Beijing finished in a disappointing eighth out of twelve teams and the manager <a href="Tang%20Pengju">Tang Pengju</a> was relieved of his duties. Serbian <a href="Milovan%20%C4%90ori%C4%87">Milovan Đorić</a> would be Beijing's first foray with a foreign manager when he joined the club at the start of the <a href="Chinese%20Jia-A%20League%202000">2000 league season</a>. His reign was exceptionally short-lived after he lost his first three games of the season before he was replaced with native coach <a href="Wei%20Kexing">Wei Kexing</a>.
<a href="Jin%20Zhiyang">Jin Zhiyang</a> became the first manager who lead Beijing to their first professional trophy when he beat <a href="Shandong%20Luneng%20Taishan%20F.C.">Jinan Taishan Jiangjun</a> 4–1 to lift the 1996 Chinese FA Cup. He is also the club's most successful manager in terms of trophies won, for 2 Chinese FA Cup Champions. After the dismissal of <a href="Lee%20Jang-soo">Lee Jang-soo</a> in September 2009, as the caretaker manager, former Beijing player <a href="Hong%20Yuanshuo">Hong Yuanshuo</a> was immediately brought into the team and on the final day of the season Beijing thrashed <a href="Hangzhou%20Greentown%20F.C.">Hangzhou Greentown</a> 4–0 to clinch the 2009 league championship, and this is the only league champion they have won so far.
Managers.
"Information correct after match played on 1 December 2019. Only competitive matches since 1994 are counted."
